description: Dmitry Fyodorov was an aspiring drummer, but he was accused of selling drugs and then found dead.
title: Blood on the tracks: Russian mystery of drummer's death in Siberia
title_page: Blood on the tracks: Russian mystery of drummer's death in Siberia - BBC News
maintext: "One of the officers put his hand into my left pocket and then a little bundle fell on to my feet which wasn't mine and couldn't possibly be mine," he told his lawyer. "Then he shoved his hand again into my empty left pocket and pulled out four more little bundles just like the first one."
